column1: #Text=Why not a Non Profit Corporation largely staffed by volunteers (retirees with expertise?
#Text=, using government owned land (park perimeters, reclaimed alleyways, higher density over schools, gov't buildings, community centres, etc.) producing high density rentals at cost recovery.
#Text=This is probably above subsidized rates, but below market rates, and it goes down over time.
#Text=It greatly increases availability of medium cost t accommodation without adding debt.
#Text=And try to streamline and speed up the project approval and delivery process as that is one of the big problems.
#Text=If there are available lower cost alternatives it will have a moderating effect on markets.
#Text=There are other alternatives, but this was a reasonable example.
